title: Was it a small shamilion with discovered skeletons in Madagascar?
subtitle: Newly discovered miniature chameleon may be the smallest adult male reptile in the world. In evolutionary terms, not everything seems to have shrunk at the same rate.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Newly discovered chameleon species in Madagascar may include the smallest adult male reptiles known for science, but suffer from disproportionately large genitals.
